title: Ticket #3634: man pages needed for bosco_* tools
description:
Manual pages are needed for all the Bosco-related command-line tools. Until there is a better place to locate them, add the man pages to the manual.

List of manual pages needed:

  • bosco_cluster
  • bosco_findplatform
  • bosco_ssh_start
  • bosco_start
  • bosco_stop
  • bosco_uninstall
  • bosco_install (even if it is just a short page to say that it invokes condor_install with a -bosco option)
remarks:
2013-Jun-04 15:39:09 by wenger:
Okay, I've committed stub man pages for all of the Bosco tools. I'm going to send this over to Karen for review.

2013-Jul-11 13:45:49 by smoler:
bosco_findplatform and bosco_ssh_start are not meant to be run from the command line by users. Man pages need to say this.
